alert.note: Alert for Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:51PM EDT until June 25 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Otsego County in northern Michigan... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gaylord, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gaylord, Vanderbilt, Sparr, Eastern Corwith Township and Pickerel Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to rapid drops in visibility and standing water on roadways. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
